alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 10:44AM CDT until April 21 at 3:24AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota... Buffalo River near Hawley affecting Clay County. Marsh River at Shelly affecting Norman County. Red Lake River at Crookston affecting Polk County. Snake River below Warren affecting Marshall County. Snake River AT Alvarado affecting Marshall County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota... Two Rivers River near Hallock affecting Kittson County. Buffalo River near Dilworth affecting Clay County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Minnesota... South Branch Buffalo River at Sabin affecting Clay County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Snake River below Warren. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 67.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 66.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 67.6 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 67.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
